name: Blue_Mint4
description: Loose sketches of girl figures caught in a flow of emotions. A bit of hope on top of resignation, hesitation and melancholy. Exploration of flow, hand drawing, fast sketches and visible paint strokes. Created fully digitally in Photoshop. Mint 4 (out of 6) Edition of 5  Mint 4 relies heavily on performative gesture - Girl sketches are brought up by a bright yellow stroke underneath, this is a mint with attitude.   Warsaw, FuzOne 30 04 2021
